translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんなでかいモンスターも倒せるなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being able to defeat such a huge monster,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう世界最強級に強いんじゃね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: aren't you already among the strongest in the world?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうかなりヤバくね？　激ヤバじゃね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't that seriously crazy? Like insanely strong?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うんうん、そうだすなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah, that's right."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おらは昔、ランス様と一緒に世界レベルの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A long time ago, I went on adventures with Sir Rance and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごい方々と冒険したことがあるだすが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some incredible people of world-class level,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞様の強さはその方々と遜色ないだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the strength of Lord <Yell> is on par with those people."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だしょー？　だしょー？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right? Right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱロッキーさんもそう思う？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rocky, you think so too, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君がニヤリと笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun grinned slyly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぃよーし、＜エール＞！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, <Yell>!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうこうなったら『魔王の子』達を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that it's come to this, let's make the 'Demon King's Children'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間にするこたーねぇぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: our allies!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　どういうことだすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What do you mean?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「＜エール＞ちゃん、既に魔王ランスと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "<Yell>-chan, I see that you already have the strength

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 張り合えるだけの強さがあると俺は見たね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to rival the Demon King Rance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界の各地にいる魔王の子を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you try to make all the Demon King's Children scattered around the world

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いちいち仲間にしてたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: your allies one by one,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何年あっても足りないってゆーかー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'd need years and years—doesn't that make no sense?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サクッと魔王ランスのもとに行けば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you just go straight to the Demon King Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面倒なくていいんじゃね？　みたいな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it'll be easier and less troublesome, right? Like that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だっろー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't that right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちんたら冒険なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Dragging out a slow adventure

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺らの性に合わないって！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: doesn't suit our style!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今時は何事もサクッと終わらせるもんだぜー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These days, you gotta get things done quickly!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、今の＜エール＞様が勝てるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, whether Lord <Yell> can win right now

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうかはおらには分からないだすが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really know... but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、ランス様も自分の子供に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, I think Sir Rance wouldn't do anything harsh

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどいことはしないと思うだすし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to his own children,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早い内に行くのはいいかも知れないだすな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so maybe it's good to go there sooner rather than later."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほらほらー、ロッキーさんだって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See, see? Even Rocky's saying so,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こう言ってるっしょー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウケる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's funny."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷはーっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Puhah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞ちゃーん、真面目すぎー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Yell>-chaaan, you're way too serious!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、調子に乗らないで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you don't start getting cocky now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつ調子に乗んの？　ってレベルだって！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then when will you? That's how much you're at that level!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大丈夫、大丈夫！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's okay, it's okay!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞ちゃんが最強なのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I guarantee that <Yell>-chan is the strongest!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この俺が保証すっから！」
「うーん、今の＜エール＞様が勝てるか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, whether Lord <Yell> can win right now

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうかはおらには分からないだすが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really know... but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、ランス様も自分の子供に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, I think Sir Rance wouldn't do anything harsh

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどいことはしないと思うだすし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to his own children,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早い内に行くのはいいかも知れないだすな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so maybe it's good to go there sooner rather than later."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほらほらー、ロッキーさんだって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See, see? Even Rocky's saying so,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こう言ってるっしょー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、何びびってんだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, what are you scared of!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だいじょーぶ！　だいじょーぶ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's all good! It's all good!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配性だなー、＜エール＞はー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're such a worrywart, <Yell>!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、でも、おらも大丈夫だって思うだす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, but I also think it will be fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だってランス様が自分の子供に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because I can't imagine Sir Rance doing anything

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどいことするって思えないだすから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cruel to his own children,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと戦闘にもならないだすよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so surely it won’t even come to a fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほらほらー、ロッキーさんだって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "See, see? Even Rocky's saying so,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こう言ってるっしょー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よーっし！　決定！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright! It's decided!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、今、俺達がここにいてー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Umm, right now we’re here—"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
